name: Get Your Shit Together (Grégoire D.)
description:
Welcome to your first day at work !

Follow our instructions or you will be fired

You have to follow the instructions that appears on your desk :

Open the envelope by holding left click to grab then right click or space to open it.

Later use the highlighter to highlight correct portions of the text.

When you are done with your task, post it in the correct mailbox.

have a good day :)

Controls

Left click and drag : move objects

Right click when dragging : use objects

Credits

@grand_machin : Game Design, Art, Music, Sound design

@gregoire-d : Game Design, Code

Music :    Cheeseburger Family - Jack Stauber

Pardon1 - Sandwich Puissant
